I really loved this place and remember it fondly.  I went back in 2005 when I was visiting Barcelona.  My friends and I went for dinner and the line was out the door (everyone was waiting for it to open!)  We made it in and enjoyed a bunch of stuff off the menu.  I do remember my vegetable pasta being really good.  We also had sangria which was really yummy.   The restaurant had two floors when we went (we were seated upstairs)...the whole place was gorgeous.  Definitely recommended.
